Copernicus Global Land Cover Service (CG.methodology: Supervised random forest classification/regression using PROBA-V data

Dynamic World V1.methodology: Deep learning fully convolutional network applied to Sentinel-2 MSI data
Dynamic World V1.class_legend: Water, Trees, Grass, Flooded Vegetation, Crops, Shrub and Scrub, Built, Bare, Snow, Ice

ESRI-10m Annual LULC.provider: Environmental Systems Research Institute (ESRI), Impact Observatory, and Microsoft Maps for Good Initiative
ESRI-10m Annual LULC.methodology: U-Net convolutional neural network applied to Sentinel-2 MSI data.

class_systems.class_legend: Built, Crops, Trees, Water, Rangeland, Flooded Vegetation, Snow/Ice, Bare Ground, Clouds

Water Channel Extent, Variable Water, Persistent Water, Dense Trees, Sparse Trees, Dense Rangeland, Sparse Rangeland, Flooded Vegetation, Inactive Cropland, Active Cropland, High Density Built, Low Density Built, Bare Ground, Snow/Ice, Cloud

Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.provider: University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory
Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.methodology: Supervised machine learning methods (decision and regression trees, U-Net convolutional neural network) applied to Landsat series data
Global LULC change 2000 and 2020.class_legend: Terra Firma Vegetation Cover, Wetland, Open Surface Water, Snow/Ice, Cropland, Built-Up And Ocean

Global Pasture Watch (GPW).methodology: Supervised Machine Learning (random forest, gradient boosted trees, and artificial neural network).
Global Pasture Watch (GPW).class_legend: Cultivated Grassland (CG), Natural/Semi-Natural Grassland (NSG), "Other Land Cover" (OLC)

South America Soybean Maps.provider: University of Maryland (UMD) Global Land Analysis and Discovery (GLAD) laboratory
South America Soybean Maps.methodology: Regression, visual interpretation, and decision tree methods.

WorldCover 10m 2021.methodology: Gradient boosting decision tree algorithm applied to Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 MSI combined data.

WorldCereal.methodology: CatBoost algorithm (gradient boosting on decision trees) applied to Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2 and Landsat-8 data.
WorldCereal.class_legend: Temporary (One-Year Cycle) Crops, Winter Cereals, Spring Cereals, Maize Season Maize And Second Season Maize
